sqlMap.insert:
INSERT /*MS-YRD-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAIL-INSERT*/ INTO brokerage_fee_detail(brokerage_fee_detail_id,brokerage_fee_id,appserial_period,borkerage_scale,receivable_amount,plan_pay_date,actual_pay_date,raw_add_time,update_add_time) VALUES (#brokerageFeeDetailId#,#brokerageFeeId#,#appserialPeriod#,#borkerageScale#,#receivableAmount#,#planPayDate#,#actualPayDate#,#rawAddTime#,#updateAddTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAIL-UPDATE*/ brokerage_fee_detail set brokerage_fee_id=#brokerageFeeId#, appserial_period=#appserialPeriod#, borkerage_scale=#borkerageScale#, receivable_amount=#receivableAmount.cent#, plan_pay_date=#planPayDate#, actual_pay_date=#actualPayDate#, update_add_time=#updateAddTime# where (brokerage_fee_detail_id = #brokerageFeeDetailId#)
sqlMap.select: select /*MS-YRD-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAIL-FIND-BY-ID*/ brokerage_fee_detail_id, brokerage_fee_id, appserial_period, borkerage_scale, receivable_amount, plan_pay_date, actual_pay_date, raw_add_time, update_add_time from brokerage_fee_detail where (brokerage_fee_detail_id = #value#)

SELECT /*MS-YRD-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAIL-FIND-BY-CONDITION*/ brokerage_fee_detail_id ,brokerage_fee_id ,appserial_period ,borkerage_scale ,receivable_amount ,plan_pay_date ,actual_pay_date ,raw_add_time ,update_add_time FROM brokerage_fee_detail where 1=1
$sortCol$
$sortOrder$
LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#

select /*MS-YRD-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAIL-FIND-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAILS*/ brokerage_fee_detail_id, brokerage_fee_id, appserial_period, borkerage_scale, receivable_amount, plan_pay_date, actual_pay_date, raw_add_time, update_add_time from brokerage_fee_detail where (brokerage_fee_id = #value#)

SELECT /*MS-YRD-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAIL-GET-BROKERAGE-FEE*/ b.* from brokerage_fee a LEFT JOIN brokerage_fee_detail b on a.brokerage_id = b.brokerage_fee_id where a.business_bill_id = #businessBillId# and b.appserial_period= #appserialPeriod#

SELECT /*MS-YRD-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAIL-GET-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAILS*/ b.* from brokerage_fee a LEFT JOIN brokerage_fee_detail b on a.brokerage_id = b.brokerage_fee_id where a.business_bill_id = #businessBillId#

SELECT /*MS-YRD-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAIL-GET-BROKERAGE-FEE-DETAIL*/ b.* from brokerage_fee a LEFT JOIN brokerage_fee_detail b on a.brokerage_id = b.brokerage_fee_id where a.business_bill_id = #businessBillId# and b.appserial_period = #appserialPeriod#
